attn_node.name: INT_CQ_FIR
attn_node.bit: Correctable ECC error detected while consuming data from the PowerBus Data ramp. See INT_CQ_ERR_INFO2 for details.
Uncorrectable ECC error detected while consuming data from the PowerBus Data ramp. See INT_CQ_ERR_INFO2 for details.
Special uncorrectable ECC error detected while consuming data on the PowerBus Data ramp for a Master DMA Read or Master CI Read.
Correctable ECC error detected while reading the PowerBus Data In Array. See INT_CQ_ERR_INFO2 for details.
Uncorrectable ECC error detected while reading the PowerBus Data In Array. See INT_CQ_ERR_INFO2 for details.
Correctable ECC error detected while reading the PowerBus Data Out Array. See INT_CQ_ERR_INFO2 for details.
Uncorrectable ECC error detected while reading the PowerBus Data Out Array. See INT_CQ_ERR_INFO2 for details.
Correctable ECC error detected while consuming data on the AIB Data Bus. See INT_CQ_ERR_INFO2 for details.
Uncorrectable ECC error detected while consuming data on the AIB Data Bus. See INT_CQ_ERR_INFO2 for details.
Received an unsolicited master Combined Response - The master cResp tTag(0:11) matched my topology ID and unit ID, but tTag(12:19) pointed to TxIDs
Received unsolicited PowerBus data - The rTag(0:11) of incoming PB data matched my topology ID and unit ID, but rTag(12:19) pointed to TxIDs that
Parity error detected on AIB credit signals from PC
Parity error detected on AIB credit available signals from PC
Parity error detected on AIB credit signals from VC
Parity error detected on AIB credit available signals from VC
Parity error detected on AIB Command Control
Parity error detected on AIB Command Bus
Parity error detected on AIB Data Control
Parity error detected on one of the following PowerBus interfaces (Rcmdx, cRespx, Data rtag). See INT_CQ_ERR_INFO0 for details.
Slave CI Store or CI Load to an improper location. This includes a Read targeting a WO space, a Write targeting a RO space, or targeting reserved
Slave CI Store or CI Load to an invalid Set Translation Table entry (that are associated with the NVPG, NVC, ESB and END BARs).
Slave CI Store or CI Load (that targets the IC_BAR) with a size violation, alignment problem, or comes from an unsupported source.
Slave CI Store or CI Load (that does not target the IC_BAR) with a size violation, alignment problem or comes from an unsupported source.
Migration Register Table (MRT) access - invalid entry selected.
Migration Register Table (MRT) access - The Table Size received in the AIB command is greater than the Target Page Size in the MRT entry.
SCOM satellite error
Topology ID Index Translation Table Entry Invalid - When INT initiates a master op (Read or Write) on the PowerBus, in determining the initial
Master Write Queue has flagged a PowerBus operational hang
Master Read Queue has flagged a PowerBus operational hang
Master Interrupt Queue has flagged a PowerBus operational hang
Master Read Queue has flagged a PowerBus data hang
CI Store Queue has flagged a PowerBus data hang
CI Load Queue has flagged an AIB data hang - Once a CI Load request has been sent on AIB, I use the PowerBus data hang timer mechanism (the
Bad cResp received during a Master Write command.
Bad cResp received during a Master Read command.
Bad cResp received during a Master Interrupt command.
A Master Read machine received cResp of abort_trm or abort_trm_ed. In addition to setting this error bit, the Read machine behaved as if the cResp was
Master Interrupt Protocol Error - The PowerBus cResp to a master interrupt command was a response that should never happen. In the P10 INT Workbook,
Master Memory Op Targeted Secure Memory - VC or PC sent CQ a memory operation with the secure RA bit (bit 12) = 1 while SMF is enabled.
AIB Fence Raised - This bit is set whenever CQ, PC, or VC assert "AIB Fence". This bit is useful to know if AIB fence was raised before another FIR
Parity error detected on CQs configuration registers.
Reserved
Command Queue (FSM) severe error summary. See INT_CQ_ERR_INFO3 for details. This includes queue overflows and FSM parity errors.
PC fatal error summary, as indicated on pc_cq_fatal_error(0:3)
PC fatal error summary, as indicated on pc_cq_fatal_error(0:3)
PC fatal error summary, as indicated on pc_cq_fatal_error(0:3)
PC fatal error summary, as indicated on pc_cq_fatal_error(0:3)

PC recoverable error summary, as indicated on pc_cq_recov_error(0:3)
PC recoverable error summary, as indicated on pc_cq_recov_error(0:3)
PC recoverable error summary, as indicated on pc_cq_recov_error(0:3)

PC informational error summary, as indicated on pc_cq_info_error(0:3)
